default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: An arsonist stands before you. Put me behind bars if you can.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: My flames burn ever brighter.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: I won't lose to it again. From now on, I shall command the flames.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: As long as I can protect those who I love...

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: But everything has been burned clean.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: No... no... I've lost control...!

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Taste the wrath of fire!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: The flames... devoured everything after all...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Did you... come here just to see me? Um... did you bring some crème brûlée?

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Whoa! Do you... do you know what happened to my attackers?

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Stay away from me! I won't pay your medical fees if you get burned.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: My hair looks weird, doesn't it? It looks like it's on fire... Many fear me because of it, but they don't know what flames really look like.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: I won't randomly combust! Don't try it anymore!

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: I hope that everyone I love can be happy and safe... why are you looking at me like that? If you'd like, I'll add you to that category.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: After fighting side by side with you for so long, I can now believe that this power can bring happiness to others...

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Someday, when this is all over, I want to make crème brûlée again with my own two hands... will you be the first to give it a taste?

default.title: Idle
default.text: Is the bakery we passed by earlier about to release new products...?

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Are you treating me like a log? Drilling wood for fire?

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: No need to watch me like that. My hair makes me stick out enough already. I won't run away.

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: You want some info about food?

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: I included a food review. Ahem, I just made it.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Be careful, or the fire will go wild again.

default.title: Deploy
default.text: You don't have to worry here.

warm_flame.title: Obtain Attire
warm_flame.text: Is everyone excited about staying up on New Year's Eve? Ahem... Honestly, I'm not that excited. I just happen to be wearing clothes I don't usually wear!

warm_flame.title: Greeting
warm_flame.text: Gotta try some new things in the new year. I... I've invited you over because I want you to try... the new flavor of my pudding.

warm_flame.title: Ordinary Contact 1
warm_flame.text: I... It's been a while, and I've made progress! The Bureau's kitchen is in perfect shape! Even the fire alarm... hasn't been triggered...

warm_flame.title: Ordinary Contact 2
warm_flame.text: I recreated braised meatballs, mapo tofu, and dumplings all with pudding! You must finish each and everyone of them!

warm_flame.title: Ordinary Contact 3
warm_flame.text: My mum used to braid my hair when I was little. I think this looks quite festive. What do you think? Does it look good?

warm_flame.title: Ordinary Contact 4
warm_flame.text: The lady in the library once told me a traditional tale. In the story, the queen has a fan that makes flames covering a whole mountain... I wonder if mine works like that too...?

warm_flame.title: Idle
warm_flame.text: "Springtime lethargy" is quite common... But hey, don't start on the first day of the new year! ...Anyway. If you're sleepy, j-just find a spot and take a nap here.

warm_flame.title: Special Attention
warm_flame.text: Why are you staring at me? Just say it if you don't like this outfit! So I didn't have to... What do you mean you love it?!

warm_flame.title: Level Up
warm_flame.text: Ah! ...Didn't you say you wanted to see fireworks? I just set some off for you.

warm_flame.title: Pat Head
warm_flame.text: Wah... You... Forget it! It's a happy day today. I'll let it slide.

caramel_starwish.title: Obtain Attire
caramel_starwish.text: Uh, you must do it like this! Keep stirring as you say your wish out loud... D-don't worry, I won't tell anyone about your wish. I'll guard it as our little secret.

caramel_starwish.title: Greeting
caramel_starwish.text: We made this Christmas pudding together. No... no matter how the taste turns out, you'll finish it, right?

caramel_starwish.title: Ordinary Contact 1
caramel_starwish.text: Every year around this time, Mom and Dad would deck the kitchen with these kinds of decorations. I tried to recreate what the holidays felt like at my home... What do you think?

caramel_starwish.title: Ordinary Contact 2
caramel_starwish.text: What... what are you standing around for? The Sinner who gave me the recipe said that stirring the batter and making wishes together is the most important step! I... I'm only reminding you because you're clearly going to mess it up, hmph!

caramel_starwish.title: Idle
caramel_starwish.text: Mmph... The presentation is perfect. The sweetness is just right. The texture is well-balanced too. Miss Faye didn't trick me with substandard stuff this time... But both types of dried fruit are so delicious, which one should I use... Eh?! Where did the rest go?!

caramel_starwish.title: Special Attention
caramel_starwish.text: You keep staring at my hair accessory. Are you craving gingerbread? It just so happens that I've written a bakery review rating their gingerbread. Check it out if you want... You think it's cute? W-well, your taste is not that bad then.

caramel_starwish.title: Level Up
caramel_starwish.text: The bigger the fire, the more likely the wish will come true!

caramel_starwish.title: Annoyed
caramel_starwish.text: This Christmas sweater feels good to the touch, doesn't it? So soft and warm. It reminds me of the sweaters Mom used to knit for me when I was little. They were heavy and unfashionable, but every time I wore them I felt like my mom was giving me a big hug.
